summary: Today we‚Äôre excited to announce two new configuration methods for how traffic flows throughout your tailnet.  IP sets allow you to define granular networks in policies, so that designated users or devices can only access necessary parts of a subnet.  Via introduces a powerful routing filter to appropriately route traffic across a global fleet of exit nodes, subnet routers, or app connectors
title: New options for granular network policy
